name: Softheme
tag_list: oftware-outsourcing, ukraine, software-development, programming, web-development, software-testing, web-design, offshore-software-development
overview:
Softheme is a trademark for a privately owned group of companies which provide services in the sphere of software development outsourcing. Our company is a 100% Ukrainian Ownership Enterprise with development and head offices in the capital of Ukraine, Kiev, and a sales office in California, USA.

Softheme is a reliable software outsourcing partner who gained clients loyalty due to micromanagement approach, high standards of quality, strong people development, and business flexibility qualities which are being implemented daily in work with partners worldwide. With a focus on mid-size business segment, Softheme provides software development and testing services to clientele from the USA, UK, and Europe, as well as to local customers, representatives of foreign enterprises in Ukraine.

Today, services in software design, development and testing provided under Softheme trademark are the synonym for quality programming and high level of project organization; the guarantee of result which is the software created with the utilization of cutting-edge technologies and approaches corresponding to the world standards. Softheme is the label of quality in software outsourcing.
